task.title: Customize to Render CGM Images (Experimental Support)

keywords.indexterm: XML documentsAuthor Mode editingImage renderingCGM images
CGM image rendering in Author mode

context.p:
provides experimental support for CGM 1.0 images.Image hotspots are not supported.
Since this is an experimental support, some graphical elements might be missing from the rendered image.
The CGM rendering support is based on a third party library. In its free of charge variant it renders the images watermarked with the string Demo, painted across the panel. You can find more information about ordering the fully functioning version here: .
Follow this procedure to allow the rendering of CGM images in Author mode:

step.cmd: Unpack the ZIP archive and copy the cgmpanel.jar into the \lib directory.
Open OXYGEN_PLUGIN_DIR/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF and add a reference to the JAR library in the Bundle-ClassPath entry.

cmd.ph: Restart Eclipse in clean mode (edit the shortcut you use to start Eclipse and add -clean as the first argument.)
